refnamediv.refpurpose: Prints information about the Jack system.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in jacko. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Prints the Jack daemon and client names, the sampling rate and frames per period, and all active Jack port names, types, states, and connections.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: May be called any number of times in the orchestra header, for example both before and after creating Jack ports in the Csound orchestra header.

refentry.note: works with an already running Jack daemon. Do not use -+rtaudio=jack in CsOptions
